mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (account_num, customer_id, name, account_password) VALUES (#{account_num}, #{customer_id}, #{name}, #{account_password})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET customer_id = #{customer_id}, name = #{name}, account_password = #{account_password}, account_money = #{account_money}, open_date = #{open_date}, bank_code = #{bank_code} WHERE account_num = #{account_num}
mapper.select: SELECT transaction_id AS transactionId, account_num AS accountNum, transaction_type AS transaction_type, amount, transaction_date AS transactionDate, depositor_name AS depositorName, to_account AS toAccount, from_account AS fromAccount FROM Transaction_details WHERE account_num = #{account_num}
SELECT * FROM account WHERE customer_id = #{customerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOUNT WHERE account_num = #{accountNumber}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INSTALLMENT_SAVINGS WHERE savings_account_num = #{accountNumber}
